text:
Have you tried setting default-servlet to false ant using /* as url pattern
in the servlet mapping?
Does this work with WebShere

<init-param>
 <param-name>default-servlet</param-name>
 <param-value>false</param-value>
</init-param>
..
<servlet-mapping>
 <servlet-name>webdav</servlet-name>
 <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
